Posts.Title: 10k Great Scottish Run

Posts.Content: I'm glad that it is considered normal as I was a little worried about how I felt about my consultant ;)
Posts.Title: Did anyone else develop a teensy consultant crush during their treatment...

Posts.Content: So sorry you have had such a rotten time Willow. I'm also in the North East and can't fault the care I've had. Where in the North East are you Moo46?
Posts.Title: Not so great experiences with NHS - good news stories please!

Posts.Content: Hi Mandy, I'm just outside of the city in Pittington. I had my surgery and chemo at UHND and radiotherapy at Freeman Newcastle.
Posts.Title: Not so great experiences with NHS - good news stories please!

Posts.Content: Hi Tonia I'm in the same position as you at the moment. After my routine oncology appointment yesterday my oncologist has booked me an appointment tomorrow for a mammogram and ultrasound. I too had surgery December 2013, completed chemotherapy in June and radiotherapy in July. I've also had 9/18 Herceptin. My lump is on the other side of my breast and feels like the end of where my lymph node may have been (if that makes sense). So like you I have my fingers crossed that it's scar tissue. You should speak with your oncologist or BCN if you have one.
Posts.Title: New lump?

Posts.Content: Hi Tonia After mammogram and ultrasound yesterday the consultant radiologist thinks my new lump is scar tissue however he wants me to return for a biopsy just to make sure. I hope you managed to get an appointment.
Posts.Title: New lump?

Posts.Content: Like you my ejection fraction dropped. It went from 63% to 55% after Herceptin number 4. I'm not scheduled to have another echo until November/December and spoke to my BCN with my concerns. I was told to be aware of any breathlessness and ankle swelling. I will be raising my concerns again next week when I have my next injection. I have heard that some people do see it rise once chemo has finished. Let's hope we both get some kind of recovery and avoid any lasting damage.
Posts.Title: Heart echo scan

Posts.Content: Hope everything went well for you today Paul - Just wanted to let you know I have been thinking of you.
